type.description: Base object type, must be LOCATION.

locationType.description: The specific type of location being created (e.g., Region, Landmark, Realm, Country, etc.). This string is provided by the application based on the request.

id.description: Unique identifier for the location (Provided by application).

name.description: Name of the location (e.g., The Whispering Peaks, Market District Plaza, Realm of Eldoria).

description.description: A detailed description of the location's key characteristics, atmosphere, and notable features, appropriate for its type and scale.

parentLocationId.description: ID of the parent location (Provided by application). Should be null for top-level locations like Realms.

typicalOccupants.description: Optional: Free-form description of typical occupants/creatures found at this location.

history.description: Optional: Brief relevant history of the location.
